thread.title: Facebook Focuses on Emerging Markets for New Products
thread.title_full: Facebook Focuses on Emerging Markets for New Products - WSJ

author: Deepa Seetharaman
title: Facebook Focuses on Emerging Markets for New Products
text:
LAGUNA BEACH, Calif.—Facebook Inc. now focuses on emerging markets when developing new products, a top executive said on Tuesday.
Speaking at WSJDLive, The Wall Street Journal’s global technology conference, Facebook product chief Chris Cox said the company’s road map is shaped by how Facebook is used in countries such as Indonesia, India,...
